mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER( USER_ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, SMSSTS_YN, EMAIL, EMAILSTS_YN, ZIP_CODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, NAMUJI_ADDRESS, PERSONALINFO_YN ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{smsstsYn}, #{email}, #{emailstsYn}, #{zipCode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{namujiAddress}, #{personalinfoYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, ACTIVE_YN, EMAIL, EMAILSTS_YN, PHONE_NUMBER, SMSSTS_YN, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, NAMUJI_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, PERSONALINFO_YN FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, SMSSTS_YN = #{smsStsYn}, EMAIL = #{email}, EMAILSTS_YN = #{emailStsYn}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode}, ROAD_ADDRESS = #{roadAddress}, JIBUN_ADDRESS = #{jibunAddress}, NAMUJI_ADDRESS = #{namujiAddress}, ACTIVE_YN = #{activeYn}, UPDATED_YN = #{updatedAt} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, ACTIVE_YN FROM USER ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC LIMIT #{startViewIdx},#{onePageViewCnt}
